titles.title: A resolution commemorating the life of Luis Alejandro "Alex" Villamayor and calling for justice and accountability.
A resolution commemorating the life of Luis Alejandro "Alex" Villamayor and calling for justice and accountability.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: Urges Paraguayan authorities to invite the Federal Bureau of Investigation to provide technical assistance for the investigation into Alex Villamayor's death and the Department of State to prioritize justice for Villamayor in its diplomatic engagement with the Paraguayan government.
